body:
Comment 9: 
Err#22 is EINVAL. But what make me curious is that bsdthread_register
should have
6 arguments, but dtruss only displays 3.

Could the new xnu kernel tighten the check on arguments? Because, of the 6
arguments,
4 of them are function pointers, but we only give the 1st of them a non-nil
pointer.
